about_the_game:
Two years have passed since Lloyd and Lura defeated Kronos and his Dark Gorillas, seemingly once and for all, and the duo have gone their seperate ways. However, the villain Scholz is ripping his way through countless lives in order to complete a decade-spanning plan to conquer the universe once and for all. The final battle is about to begin, and the blood shed at the end of it all will sow the seeds of a new beginning.

To save the galaxy, you will have to switch between both Lloyd and Lura to complete a selection of platforming stages, most with a boss battle at the end. This task will require the utilization of both characters' expanded movesets and an array of customization options to get the characters through a 12+ level adventure, at the end of which lies the fiercest battle to ever take place on any world. Beyond the biggest adventure the series has ever seen, Lloyd the Monkey 3: Judgement Day promises a conclusion that will leave you breathless!
